With last minute reservation, they were able to accommodate and squeeze us in on the New Year's Eve.  The restaurant is quaint with comfortable and homey feeling.  The prix fix menu for the NYE was fantastic.  We started with soup and seafood tapas.  Sorbet to cleanse our palate follow by lobsters and filet mignon.  Tiramisu, plate of sweets and coffee topped off the meal.  Wine and Cava were free flowing and the mood festive through out the evening.  All the guests were given a bag of NYE party favors and a small box of 12 grapes to celebrate NYE down in the Placa de Espana a few blocks away.  The staff were cheerful and friendly and were able to accommodate our lack of Catalan communication skills.  Will definitely go back and try their regular menu.
